answers.answer: They will probably monitor you as long as they can. They might do some biophysical profiles on the baby to make sure its OK and as long as it doesn't get out of control they probably won't make you deliver too soon. Hang in there!
Thanks, I go tomorrow for my apt with my new doctor so we'll see how it goes... Fingers crossed

question: So I just found out that I've developed preeclamsia and I was wondering if anyone else has been in the same boat and what the protocol was. Were you induced or put on bed rest or just monitored closely? I'm 36wks 5 days and trying to figure things out. I'm being transferred to another doctor tomorrow and just trying to get my head wrapped around the situation.
title: question about preeclampsia
